introduction: MTV旗下频道LOGO资助拍摄的独立短片系列之一。Tom is a sixteen year old who lives in a small town in Bavaria. He is often bullied at school for being different than the other boys. In order to deal with his feelings of teenage angst and isolation, Tom searches for the courage to come out to his classmates. During the evenings, Tom trolls the internet in anonymity, hoping to find a community and a support network. While online, Tom finds out that Nikias, one of the most popular boys in his school, is gay. Tom must decide what to do next...
